About me

My name is Vojislav, I am a Freelance Developer and Designer based in Serbia. I am passionate about designing creative and intuitive UI's, using the latest standards at my disposal. Always researching and following new trends to be at the top of my game which reflects on better user experience. When I'm not doing that I enjoy everything involving technology, also I very much enjoy the Great Outdoors and being in nature I would say I'm very eco-friendly.
